description: As Germany celebrates 30 years of reunification, many still identify with a state that has vanished.
title: German reunification: Young Germans in search of their eastern roots
title_page: German reunification: Young Germans in search of their eastern roots - BBC News
maintext: But that comes with advantages, she says. Parents may not be able to buy their children a car or an apartment, or line up an internship with a buddy from the tennis club. But there is also less pressure to conform to career expectations. And lower rents and fewer inhabitants mean more space for fun and creativity.
